name: Solitaire Klondike Fish
summary: Solitaire Klondike Fish is the great CREATIVE solitaire card games for you with an AMAZING ocean theme. Based on the solitaire gameplay, it is totally true to the spirit of the classic solitaire (also known as Patience or Klondike) and it will help you to keep your brain smart & sharp.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: Solitaire Klondike Fish (by Solitaire Aquarium) - classic card game for Android and iOS - gameplay
